mapper.select:
select tableName , engine , tableComment, createTime from ( select name tableName, 'DM' as engine, crtdate createTime from SYSOBJECTS where SCHID in ( select ID from SYSOBJECTS where NAME IN ( select USERNAME from USER_USERS ) AND TYPE$='SCH' ) and SUBTYPE$='UTAB' ) left join ( select TVNAME, COMMENT$ tableComment from SYSTABLECOMMENTS where SCHNAME IN ( select USERNAME from USER_USERS ) and TABLE_TYPE ='TABLE' ) on TABLENAME=TVNAME
and table_name like concat('%', #{tableName}, '%')
order by tablename
limit #{offset}, #{limit}

select count(*) from USER_TABLES
and table_name like concat('%', #{tableName}, '%')

select tableName , engine , tableComment, createTime from ( select name tableName, 'DM' as engine, crtdate createTime from SYSOBJECTS where SCHID in ( select ID from SYSOBJECTS where NAME IN ( select USERNAME from USER_USERS ) AND TYPE$='SCH' ) and SUBTYPE$='UTAB' and name=#{tableName}) left join ( select TVNAME, COMMENT$ tableComment from SYSTABLECOMMENTS where SCHNAME IN ( select USERNAME from USER_USERS ) and TABLE_TYPE ='TABLE' and TVNAME=#{tableName}) on TABLENAME=TVNAME

select F.COLUMN_NAME columnName,F.DATA_TYPE dataType,F.COMMENT$ columnComment,E.P,'' extra from ( select * from USER_TAB_COLUMNS a left join ( select * from SYSCOLUMNCOMMENTS where TVNAME=#{tableName} and SCHNAME IN ( select USERNAME from USER_USERS ) ) b on COLUMN_NAME=b.COLNAME WHERE a.TABLE_NAME=#{tableName} ) f left join( select c.TABLE_NAME, c.COLUMN_NAME,'P' p from USER_CONS_COLUMNS c left join (select * from USER_CONSTRAINTS) d on c.CONSTRAINT_NAME=D.CONSTRAINT_NAME where d.CONSTRAINT_TYPE='P' and c.TABLE_NAME=#{tableName} ) e on f.COLUMN_NAME=e.COLUMN_NAME
